column1: Which of the following is true about protected access modifier?
column4: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected can be accessed by any class.
column5: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected can be accessed by any class lying in same package.
column6: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected in the superclass can be accessed only by its child class.
